metadata.title: Oleksii Koba • Frontend & Full Stack Developer Portfolio
metadata.description: Professional Front-End Developer – Creating Modern Interfaces, Optimization, and Scalable Solutions. I am an experienced Front-End Developer with over 7 years of experience working on modern web applications and websites. I specialize in CMS Drupal 8/9/10, Twig, JavaScript, Bootstrap, SCSS, and HTML, as well as building dynamic interfaces using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. My projects are always responsive, performance-optimized, and SEO-friendly, designed with a user-centric approach and modern trends in mind. I have experience both in independent project development and working in a team, collaborating closely with UX/UI designers, backend developers, and SEO specialists. I create intelligent and aesthetically pleasing solutions that meet business requirements and provide an excellent user experience. My skills also include API integration, code optimization, improving Core Web Vitals, and adapting websites to WCAG and digital accessibility standards. Additionally, I work on modernizing and migrating existing systems, aligning them with current technological standards. If you are looking for an experienced Front-End Developer who combines aesthetics, functionality, and modern technologies – feel free to contact me!
metadata.keywords: frontend developer, developer portfolio, website development, responsive coding, React and Next.js development, Tailwind CSS coding, API integration, Drupal and WordPress development, Core Web Vitals optimization, SEO and accessibility (WCAG)

first.title: General Information
first.description:
I am a Mid-Level Front-End Developer with over 7 years of experience working with CMS Drupal 8/9/10, Twig, JavaScript, Bootstrap, SCSS, and HTML. I create modern, responsive, and efficient interfaces, focusing on aesthetics and functionality. I have also worked with TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, building both traditional websites and advanced web applications. My goal is to grow in front-end architecture and deepen my knowledge of React and Next.js
to create intuitive and scalable solutions.

three.description: For many years, I have worked with the Drupal CMS, gaining experience in creating and customizing websites. I have worked with various Drupal versions (from 7 to 10), which has allowed me to master both building custom themes and modules and managing content. Thanks to Drupal's flexibility, I have been able to implement projects of varying complexity, adapting them to the unique needs of clients.
